attributes.action: ensure any MP found to have abused and taken personal advantage of the expenses system should be sacked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to ensure that every single MP, regardless of Political Party to pay back all costs and be sacked if they have been found to have exploited the MP expenses system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
